summary: An ordinance amending Section 1 of Ordinance No. 54028, entitled, An ordinance authorizing and directing the Board of Public Works to incur an indebtedness against the General Fund on account on the cost and expense of the improvement of Harbor Avenue Southwest, and certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, Local Improvement District No. 4633, and appropriating money therefor, approved November 8, 1927.
